statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); if [ -d "$current_dir/.git" ]; then cd "$current_dir"; branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'detached'); status=$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l); if [ "$status" -gt 0 ]; then git_info="\033[0;33m$branch\033[0m \033[0;31m($status)\033[0m"; else git_info="\033[0;32m$branch\033[0m"; fi; else git_info="\033[0;37mno git\033[0m"; fi; dir_name=$(basename "$current_dir"); printf "\033[0;36m%s\033[0m | %s | \033[0;35m%s\033[0m" "$dir_name" "$git_info" "$model"
